thread.title: Silver Lake, P2 Capital to Take Blackhawk Network Private for $2.57 Billion

author: Imani Moise
title: Silver Lake, P2 Capital to Take Blackhawk Network Private for $2.57 Billion
text:
Blackhawk Network Holdings Inc. said Tuesday that it reached a deal to sell itself in a go-private transaction worth about $2.57 billion.
Private-equity firm Silver Lake and investment fund P2 Capital Partners will buy the gift-card company for $45.25 per share in cash representing a 24% premium from Fridayâ€™s closing price. Including debt, the company said the deal was worth $3.5 billion.
P2...
